hero.title: Supporting you with calm, love, and presence
hero.subtitle: Bilingual Full-Spectrum Doula, HypnoBirthing Educator, and Motherhood Coach in Houston & online.
hero.description: Supporting families through pregnancy, birth, and postpartum with compassionate, evidence-based care in English and Spanish.

about.title: About Vio La Doula
about.subtitle: Your Doula Latina
about.intro:
I'm Vio ♡ a bilingual doula, HypnoBirthing® educator, and motherhood coach. I support women and families through pregnancy, birth, and postpartum with calm, confidence, and genuine presence.

My passion for this work comes from my own experiences: two empowering HypnoBirthing births, one at a birthing center and one at home. These births showed me the strength of the mind-body connection and the importance of compassionate, informed support.

I believe in the wisdom of your body, the clarity of your mind, and the truth of your heart. My work brings all of this together so you can move through motherhood feeling supported, grounded, and connected to yourself.

services.title: Birth & Postpartum Support
services.subtitle: Comprehensive doula packages tailored to your needs. All doula services include a backup doula.

essentials.name: The Essentials Package
essentials.description: The perfect care you need along your journey to parenthood and the arrival of your baby
features: Unlimited phone + email support from pregnancy to postpartum
Two (2) in-home prenatal visits with parents
Unlimited labor support from active labor to birth
Unlimited postpartum support via phone, text, and email

premium.name: The Premium Package
premium.description: Everything you get with the essentials package but with a little extra TLC and pampering
features: Unlimited phone + email support from pregnancy to postpartum
Three (3) in-home prenatal visits with parents
Unlimited labor support from active labor to birth
Unlimited postpartum support via phone, text, and email

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to begin your supported birth journey?

questions.question: When should I hire a doula?
questions.answer: The best time to hire a doula is during your second trimester (around 20-24 weeks), but I accept clients throughout pregnancy and even during labor if needed.

questions.question: What types of births do you support?
questions.answer: I support births at birth centers, home births, and hospitals throughout the Greater North Houston Area. I work collaboratively with your team.

questions.question: What if my baby comes early or late?
questions.answer: I am on call 24/7 starting at 37 weeks gestation until your baby arrives, regardless of timing. There are no additional fees for early or late births.

questions.question: Do you provide virtual support?
questions.answer: Yes! I offer virtual prenatal visits, labor support via video call, and postpartum consultations for families who prefer remote support or live far away.

questions.question: What languages do you speak?
questions.answer: I provide full doula services in both English and Spanish, ensuring comfortable communication throughout your journey.

questions.question: Do you accept insurance?
questions.answer: I do not accept insurance at the moment. However, I do offer payment plans.
